info.name: Course Batch Management APIs
info.description:
The Course Batch Management API allows you to manage course batches on the Sunbird platform. A batch is used to arrange courses for specific sets or groups.The basic operations for this API include Create, Update, Read, List.

The URL for Coure Batch Management API(s) is /course/v1.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Fetch a particular Batch
This API is associated with fetching a particular batch on the Sunbird Platform.
The endpoint for Fetch a particular Batch is /batch/read/{Batch_ID}
The fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory. They cannot be null or empty.

response.name: CourseBatch Read - 200 OK

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

request.description:
This API is associated with updating a batch on the Sunbird Platform.
The endpoint for Course Batch Update is /batch/update
The fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory. They cannot be null or empty.

response.name: CourseBatch Update - 400 Bad Request - Invalid batch start date
CourseBatch Update - 400 Bad Request - Invalid course batch id

request.description:
Lists the existing batches
This API is associated with fetching and listing existing batches
The endpoint for Lists the existing batches is /batch/list
The fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory. They cannot be null or empty.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

response.name: CourseBatch Search - 200 OK
